title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Technical Support Post
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, M.Sc., can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 . Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at ...
